categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Pressik was a male Human who served as an officer in the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War.

In 3640 BBY, he commanded one of the detachments of the emergency command center which orbited the planet Ziost. He was visited by Theron Shan, a spy to the Republic, who came for some information. Pressik didn't answer that since he was drunk. As Theron broke into the command center, Pressik and his team tried to stop him until they were killed by Jedi historian Gnost-Dural.
Pressik was considered to be arrogant and provoked turned violent clashes, but without attacking civilians, which could damage his career.
